page.title: 12TRANSPORT, West Cambs.
page.content:
Personal transport - walking, cycling, motorcycling, motor cars. Also "Stage- coach" service calling at all three villages. Subsidised by Cambs County Council, this Community coach serves whole of West Huntingdonshire and East Northamptonshire. Operated by Keyston Coaches, once based Keyston village, now moved to Thrapston (through change in Planning Regulations). Daily (used by shoppers and commuters) + weekly to towns for markets. Timetable shows timing points, but if booked the day before, passengers also picked up/set down at other safe points.
Train service from Huntingdon/St Neots /Peterborough on Kings Cross Line. Stagecoach meets buses for Cambridge/ Bedford at Huntingdon, for Kettering at Thrapston, and during term time fit round school/College day.
